email.subject: Raiding The Louvre
email.body:
We have information of a hackersquad making experimental cracking tool, seize it. ---- Our asset provided us with information about a hackersquad that is allegedly developing a new tool that could prove rather useful in our upcoming operation. As you might've guessed we're interested in acquiring said tool, or whatever developments they might have on it. Having other agents occupied, this one is for you, Pretence. I've got a little report laying in our drop-server. You look like a fine-upstanding representative of our profession, so time to show your worth, unless you want an express trip on the hearse. Go there for your rota, fill up your quota, but watch for marauders.
- Reigning_Strife
P.s. Oh and that diary o'yours? Unless you want to earn the right to die early, cut it out. No loose ends.
